page.title: 13Medical Services
page.content: Patients may choose which doctor they register with but choice is limited by mobility. Dr.Elliot is the only doctor in East Hoathly and, in the absence of a Chemist's, he dispences medicines. He is not in partnership but has a relief system with two doctors from outside the area. Under reorganisation in 1974, all District Nurses are attached to a doctor and specialise in midwifery, health visiting or as a distict nurse. Sister Seaman is the local health visitor. The hospital used by most people in the area is in Eastbourne, thirteen miles away. Surgery hours in East Hoathly are: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday 0900-0930 and 1745-1845.
